ED_Title: Notification by the Secretary-General under Article 12, paragraph 2, of the Charter of the United Nations
ED_DecisionText: At its 86th plenary meeting, on 30 June 2023, the General Assembly took note of the note by the Secretary-General.  (Footnote: A/77/300.)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of the text of this decision will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
